Description:

The King is back and he's better than ever! Our story begins with our hero hitchhiking when he's picked up by two wild girls, who are astounded when they realize who've they picked up. They idol "John C. Holmes." After an enjoyable encounter the girls decide to drug him and hold him captive as their sex slave!
A wild and erotic extravaganza ensues featuring an all star cast that will leave the viewer breathless
